name: NijiExpressive_v1
description:
Vivid and elegant, niji expressive style lora

try this lora online --->NijiExpressive_v1 - v1.0 | 吐司 Tusi.Art

Do you suffer from sd style rigidity?

Do you envy niji v5 for its action and camera?

Now, you can experience the same exquisite style on sd

Trained by 500+ quality niji pictures

no trigger words

Do well on Novel ai original model

weight 0.9 ? or other, have fun!!
